lead_paragraph: Shares of consumer companies rose after the data was released, but energy and mining companies sank as commodities prices slumped.

headline.print_headline: Shares Climb, Spurred   by Solid Jobs Report
headline.main: Encouraged by Jobs Report, Market Moves Higher

snippet: Shares of consumer companies rose after the data was released, but energy and mining companies sank as commodities prices slumped.
abstract: Stock ascend after Labor Dept says job growth continued apace in March.
